page.title: 09Transport in Frome
page.content: {Railways:}It is quite easy to travel to Weymouth because you don't have to change trains. To travel to London, Bristol or Taunton you have to change at Westbury. Times are rarely convenient.Frome has it's own station on the south east edge of the town. {Buses:}Frome does not have a bus station. Most bus routes come through the town. It is easy to travel to Bath, Warminster & Trowbridge but not to Shepton Mallet or Wells. Without a car it is not easy to visit places of interest around. Some private coach companies run trips infrequently to interesting places. Coaches:The only regular service is daily to London (National Express from Frome & Roman City from Shepton Mallet. Otherwise it means going to Warminster e.g. for the South coast. Ann White & Heather Phillips (10)
